databaseConfig.sql:
select MS_DM_BUNRUI.MS_DM_BUNRUI_ID , MS_DM_BUNRUI.CODE , MS_DM_BUNRUI.NAME , MS_DM_BUNRUI.DELETE_FLAG , MS_DM_BUNRUI.SEND_FLAG , MS_DM_BUNRUI.VESSEL_ID , MS_DM_BUNRUI.DATA_NO , MS_DM_BUNRUI.USER_KEY , MS_DM_BUNRUI.RENEW_DATE , MS_DM_BUNRUI.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_DM_BUNRUI.TS
from MS_DM_BUNRUI WHERE (MS_DM_BUNRUI.DELETE_FLAG = 0 or MS_DM_BUNRUI.DELETE_FLAG is NULL)

INSERT INTO MS_DM_BUNRUI ( MS_DM_BUNRUI_ID , CODE , NAME , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_DM_BUNRUI_ID , :CODE , :NAME , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_DM_BUNRUI SET CODE = :CODE , NAME = :NAME , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_DM_BUNRUI_ID = :MS_DM_BUNRUI_ID
